reviews.review_msg: Dr. Rebecca Cox is amazing! She is so honest, caring, and her classes are enjoyable. She's always open, supportive and wants to see her students succeed. I learned a lot from her class, very straight-forward, clear and hilarious.

This instructor is unresponsive and ignores student requests. He will not even share session slides.  They are poorly written anyway. Very negative experience. Would highly recommend you wait until another prof is teaching. Many other profs at SFU are great.
The worst professor I've had. Provides very little feedback to students. Marking is done very late. Not accessible. Not responsive.

The best prof EVER! Make us work hard but is all worth it. Super engaged in assisting students to get most of the experience. Her knowledge and commitment are very inspiring. Super appreciated the guess lectures.
